text: F.C. BATE Borisov is a football club which plays in Belarus. == Current squad == == Honours == * Belarusian Premier League ** Winners (15): 1999, 2002, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018 ** Runners-up (5): 1998, 2000, 2003, 2004, 2019 ** Third place: 2001 * Belarusian Cup ** Winners (4): 2005–06, 2009–10, 2014–15, 2019–20 ** Runners- up (4): 2001–02, 2004–05, 2006–07, 2015–16 * Belarusian Super Cup ** Winners (7): 2010, 2011, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017 ** Runners-up (3): 2012, 2018, 2019 * Belarusian Second League ** Winners: 1996 * Football Championship
